gem ‘less2sass’ https://rubygems.org/gems/less2sass

don’t forget to add twbs-font-path on top or variable.sass file // When true, asset path helpers are used, otherwise the regular CSS `url()` is used. // When there no function is defined, `fn('')` is parsed as string that equals the right hand side // NB: in Sass 3.3 there is a native function: function-exists(twbs-font-path) $bootstrap-sass-asset-helper: (twbs-font-path("") != unquote('twbs-font-path("")')) !default;
